comments: This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a multi-year contract. Architectural and engineering services for design of the Government Conference Centre as well as construction administration. The project scope of work includes: abatement and selective demolition, limited excavation, seismic evaluation, structural and envelope upgrades, base building systems replacement, information technology infrastructure and equipment, security infrastructure and devices, new vertical circulation throughout, new loading dock, interior fit-up, and landscape work.
